There was a quiet laugh from DRILL BIT, "Your comrades have bought our a=
ssistance, for now.  The Maximals agreed for our assistance to rescue you i=
n return for a stasis pod and a sparked protoform after this is over, sworn=
 on the Matrix."

An outright lie - DINOBOT had wanted it, but LEO PRIME ha=
d essentially beat him down over it.  But right now, there were seeds of ch=
aos to sow for DRILL BIT as the MAXIMALS would probably be rushing down the=
 tunnel in a swarm then. A ll teh while to try and stir up some chaos when =
hte two groups 'met'.  "And we are here to rescue you all.  Tel lme, how wa=
